body: Idc what yall say, Steph is my favorite waifu
Yooo finally the plot that never was covered what happened after the scene in the anime

@hahonryuu the doujins uploaded at the e-hentai gets forked here, the community gets to tag the doujins and the guidelines says that only one picture is needed for the lolicon tag (since they're strict and sends every loli/shota to sadpanda)

There should be some questions on whether 1 single picture in an entire doujin should qualify something as a lolicon tag. I also question the "low lolicon" even more since i feel that character seems too tall to be low lolicon.
Man...I really wish they would have made a proper second season.

@Sky'sBiG
if you see at page 20, that what it mean of low lolicon, don't ask me why they made tags like that, it just to show that the doujin have some loli things usually 1 page / not the main focus
What is low lolicon? Not enough lolicon???
this and the esdeath doujin finally translated? #blessed
